bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XIII. Germany III. Bundesrepublik Deutschland und Deutsche Demokratische Republik.
bibl.seg: Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XIII. Germany III. Bundesrepublik Deutschland und Deutsche Demokratische Republik.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1978, in fol., vi-84 pp., ill.
C.R. par P. Gasnault, BBF 24 (1979) pp. 195-196. - A. Petrucci, Gnomon 53 (1981) pp. 136-139. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 30 (1984) pp. 115-116.
